title: porumaiyai izaindEn
sahitya:
porumaiyai izhaindEn bhuvanEshvariyE bhU maghaL vANiyum pOTriDum mAyE

anupallavi

orumai manamAghi nin arumaippadam paNivOr varumai aghaTriDum perumai unadallavO

caraNam

karmamum jnAnamum teriyAr shiriyAr marumaiyil varum sukham oruvarum ariyAr
urimaiyuDan unadu uyar tiruvaruLai peruvadarkkum tAyE tiramai illaiyE
